title.rendered: How to Optimize Conversion Rates for Clients with Neil Patel – Deep-Dive Q&A

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”custom-header” css=”.vc_custom_1626733748673{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1623446304748{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

The Revenue Growth Platform

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1626733757312{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background: #1e1e1f url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/AAS_Hero_Chip_R2.jpg?id=202332) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525274666229{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

How to Optimize Conversion Rates for Clients with Neil Patel

[vc_text_separator title=”Deep-dive Q&A” title_align=”separator_align_left” color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#84c340″ el_class=”speakers-divider” css=”.vc_custom_1597244890286{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1618843854218{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Part of our Agency GROWTH Series

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]In this fast-paced video, you’ll learn how to optimize client campaigns from New York Times bestselling author Neil Patel. Neil has helped drive 1.3 billion visitors to startups and Fortune 100 brands and joins SharpSpring CEO Rick Carlson to share his expertise. During this quick-hitting session, he answers agencies’ burning questions about how to revolutionize conversions for their clients.

Touted as the worlds #1 marketer, Neil’s deep-dive Q&A is a can’t-miss session with tons of critical nuggets to apply to your agency.

Check out other free sessions like this one via our Agency Growth Series with other top influencers in digital marketing like Seth Godin, Ann Handley, Rand Fishkin, Shama Hyder and many more![/vc_column_text]

Hosts

Neil Patel

Co-Founder, Neil Patel Digital

Neil Patel is a New York Times bestselling author. A leading web influencer according to The Wall Street Journal, he’s also a Forbes pick for top ten marketers. He was recognized as a top 100 entrepreneur under the age of 30 by President Obama and a top 100 entrepreneur under the age of 35 by the United Nations.

Rick Carlson

CEO/Founder, SharpSpring

Rick is founder and CEO of SharpSpring. He started with the goal of bringing marketing analytics and automation tools to small and medium businesses on an affordable and easy-to-use SaaS platform. Rick has more than 15 years of executive management experience in the technology sector, holding president, CEO, general manager, and board positions at several successful Internet security companies.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1597245028583{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-35-percent”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
